citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 2:00pm on
Tuesday, December 3, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and was informed
by a family member that the licensee was not home and was not expected for several hours. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 2:00pm on 
Tuesday, December 3, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and was informed 
by a family member that the licensee was not home and was not expected for several hours. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
